title: SysFileFlush (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SysFileFlush : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Flush the file cache and write into the file

rows.Name: SysFileFlush
rows.Comment: Returns the runtime system error code (see CmpErrors_Itfs.library):ERR_OK: Succeeded flushing the fileERR_FAILED: Error occurred during file flushERR_NOTIMPLEMENTED: File flush is not implementedERR_NOT_SUPPORTED: File flush not available on the target
